name: Pixel Mage Survival
description:
Hi guys, 

I have lunched my first mobile game on Android, that is available under following link:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.creativekind.pixelmagesurvival

Pixel Mage Survival - It's an survival game in 2D pixel style, with a tons of skills (simple, path and ultimate skills), dozen of enemies and items of different rarities. 

There are several worlds, with different enemies and if you feel that it is to easy, you have possibility to switch between level difficilties from normal to GODLIKE in no time.

Upon character death, you will be rewarded with souls that can be used to buy permanent upgrades, new pets and also unlock a new levels.

You are free to share you feeling and suggestion about the game.

Besides my own art that you can find on my my page, I have also used monsters from:

LuizMelo - https://luizmelo.itch.io

Chierit - https://chierit.itch.io
